https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wfu18DDhXCzurePALMLLHVlI7hj.jpg The film-maker goes back to Bologna where he did a stay twenty years earlier. The ties of a patchy, lacunal and tragic memory begin to interweave the Italy of the “years of lead” and that of Berlusconi. Bologna centrale
